OPIUM.Definition: a powerful drug made from poppy seeds

MENTALITY.Definition: a way of thinking about things

EXPLOITING.Definition: using something in a way that helps you

WORLD STANDING.Definition: how a country is viewed in the world

AMBITIONS.Definition: wishes to do or achieve something

SILK.Definition: a delicate, soft cloth made from a thread produced by silkworms

PORCELAIN.Definition: a hard but delicate white substance, often used for plates and cups

IMBALANCE.Definition: a situation where two things are unequal

LOGISTICAL.Definition: related to how something is practically done

BASIS.Definition: facts or ideas from which something can be developed

TRIBUTE SYSTEM.Definition: a system where gifts are presented to a leader

SUPERIOR PLAYER.Definition: the more powerful of two or more people

CELESTIAL.Definition: relating to the skies or gods

BARBARIANS.Definition: members of a group from a different country

PUT-DOWN.Definition: something said intended to make someone feel stupid or small

POPPIES.Definition: a plant with brightly coloured, usually red flowers

SMUGGLE.Definition: to take things from one place to another secretly (and often illegally)

ADDICTS.Definition: people who cannot stop using something

SHEER.Definition: used to emphasis how great or important something is

USERS.Definition: people who use something, e.g. drugs

COMPENSATED.Definition: given money in exchange for something that has been lost or damaged

ON THE HOOK.Definition: if you are on the hook for something, it means you need to do it. It's usually used for paying a debt.

PUSHED AROUND.Definition: tell someone to do something in an impolite or bullying way

COMPENSATION.Definition: money that is given in exchange for something that's been lost

EXTRATERRITORIALITY.Definition: the right of foreign citizens to be under the laws of their own country, not the laws of the country they are in

EXPATS.Definition: people who do not live in their own country

FOOTHOLD.Definition: a position from which you can make progress

MISSIONARY.Definition: someone who has been sent to live in a foreign country to teach their religion

DIGRESS.Definition: move away from the main point

FERTILE.Definition: easy for something new to develop

OPIOID.Definition: a class of drugs that includes heroin, fentanyl, and OxyContin
